title: Ticket #770: Need documentation for running hadoop map-reduce in parallel universe
description:
Let's make a wiki page that describes how to use Condor's Parallel Universe to run hadoop map-reduce jobs using our spiffy map-reduce startup script (which could be an attachment on the wiki page for now).

Course once this matures more, the startup script will go into the release and the documentation into the manual.
remarks:
2009-Dec-23 13:05:32 by faisal:
I made couple of changes to parallel universe/map-reduce script. I am updating the documentation with respect to these changes and will put this on a wiki page.
2010-Oct-20 15:59:08 by jfrey:
Bulk change of target version from v070504 to v070505 using ./ticket-target-mover.
2011-Jan-27 14:46:04 by danb:
Bulk change of target version from v070505 to v070506 using ./ticket-target-mover.
2011-Feb-01 14:49:30 by tannenba:
Bulk change of target version from v070506 to NULL using ./ticket-target-mover.

2012-Mar-05 14:17:18 by gthain:
Ignore this remark. Wrong ticket.

2012-Mar-05 14:34:00 by gthain:
This has been documented on the MapReduce page. Note that we now recommend running in the vanilla universe.
creator: tannenba
